analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/14/0x2aae473e183f9a61a65502367db6f65628f722af.sol:
	Contract Fructus has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0x2aae473e183f9a61a65502367db6f65628f722af.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/14/0x2aae473e183f9a61a65502367db6f65628f722af.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/14/0x2aae473e183f9a61a65502367db6f65628f722af.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/14/0x2aae473e183f9a61a65502367db6f65628f722af.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
